name: Freshwater Crab (Potamon Tauricum)
generalDescription: The coins are dedicated to the relic species - the only representative of Potamon Tauricum in the fauna of Ukraine
averseDescription: On the coin obverse set in the wreath of images of plants and animals there is engraved the small National Emblem of Ukraine and the inscriptions:
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is depicted a freshwater crab, a snail in the seaweeds and the circular inscriptions: ПРІСНОВОДНИЙ КРАБ / (Freshwater Crab) and POTAMON TAURICUM.
